Summary: was alerted to the object by my sons and wife. orange pulsating orb that moved from south to north and then disappeared.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around July 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailswas alerted to the object by my sons and wife. orange pulsating orb that moved from south to north and then disappeared. noticed that my neighbors also saw it as they were pointing at the sky at the object as well.the object was silent and seemed to be floating thru the air. about 5 minutes after the object disappeared, we saw a large helicopter circling the area. there have also been several large army \black helicopters in the area the past few days.
